## serialization.variables.VariableSerializer class

Serializer for saving and loading variable state.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clear(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.variables.variableserializer.clear.md) |  | Disposes of any variables that exist on the workspace. |
|  [load(state, workspace)](./blockly.serialization.variables.variableserializer.load.md) |  | Deserializes the variable defined by the given state into the given workspace. |
|  [save(workspace)](./blockly.serialization.variables.variableserializer.save.md) |  | Serializes the variables of the given workspace. |
